quotes.quote: A horse loves freedom, and the weariest old work horse will roll on the ground or break into a lumbering gallop when he is turned loose into the open.
It's always been and always will be the same in the world.The horse does the work and the coachman is tipped.
There is nothing so good for the inside of a man as the outside of a horse.
A horse is the projection of peoples dreams about themselves, strong, powerful, beautiful. And it has the capability of giving us escape from our mundane existence.
If you're lucky enough to draw a good horse, you still have to ride him, then the next ones.
Most horses don't walk backwards voluntarily, because what they can't see doesn't exist.
If you fall off a horse, you get back up. I am not a quitter.
When your horse follows you without being asked, when he rubs his head on yours, and when you look at him and feel a tingle down your spine, you know you are loved.
Horse riding is so much more then just horse riding, its so much harder then most people think.
There is no secret so close as that between a rider and his horse.
The horse, with beauty unsurpassed, strength immeasurable and grace unlike any other, still remains humble enough to carry a man upon his back.
Whoever said a horse was dumb, was dumb.
A man on a horse is spiritually, as well as physically, bigger then a man on foot.
A horse never runs so fast as when he has other horses to catch up and outpace.
The earth would be nothing without the people, but the man would be nothing without the horse.
A good horse should be seldom spurred.
I have seen things so beautiful they have brought tears to my eyes. Yet none of them can match the gracefulness and beauty of a horse running free.
It's a lot like nuts and bolts, if the rider's nuts, the horse bolts!
To ride a horse is to ride the sky.
I can always tell which is the front end of a horse, but beyond that my art is not above the ordinary.
If you spend all day on horseback, and you hop off, you walk around like you still have a horse between your legs. And it affects your shoulders. They fall.
People on horses look better than they are. People in cars look worse than they are.
Slippery-smooth rhythmic motion, absolute single-minded purpose, motion for the pleasure of motion itself. It was terrible it its beauty, the flight of the horse.
The only time some people work like a horse is when the boss rides them.
Horseback riding is the only sport where your equipment can decide not to cooperate with you. Feeling down? Saddle up.
In riding a horse we borrow freedom.
Anybody who finds it easy to make money on the horses is probably in the dog food business.
It's the aspirin of horseback riding, it cures everything.
No hour of life is wasted that is spent in the saddle.
A horse can lend its rider the speed and strength he or she lacks - but the rider who is wise remembers it is no more than a loan.
A horse which stops dead just before a jump and thus propels its rider into a graceful arc provides a splendid excuse for general merriment.
Equestrian art is the perfect understanding and harmony between horse and rider.
Equestrian art is the perfect understanding and harmony between horse and rider.
When you are on a great horse, you have the best seat you will ever have.
In riding a horse, we borrow freedom.
No one can teach riding so well as a horse.
Don't be the rider who gallops all night and never sees the horse that is beneath him.
A good trainer can hear a horse speak to him. A great trainer can hear him whisper.
I have heard that one can conquer the empire on horseback, but one cannot govern it on horseback.
A woman never looks better than on horseback.
If you fall asleep on horseback, the horse will stop by the rock. Art is a car. Kitsch is a horse.
A man in a passion, rides a mad horse.
It takes a good deal of physical courage to ride a horse. This, however, I have. I get it at about forty cents a flask, and take it as required.

Riding a horse is not a gentle hobby, to be picked up and laid down like a game of solitaire. It is a grand passion. It seizes a person whole and once it has done so, he will have to accept that his life will be radically changed.
Speak your mind, but ride a fast horse.
The ass will carry his load, but not a double load. Ride not a free horse to death.
There is something about riding down the street on a prancing horse that makes you feel like something, even when you ain't a thing.
The horse thinks one thing and he that rides him another.
A good rider on a good horse is as much above himself and others as the world can make him.
No ride is ever the last one. No horse is ever the last one you will have. Somehow there will always be other horses, other places to ride them.
A man must ride alternately on the horses of his private and his public nature.
A bad ride is much better than a good walk.
